PROGRAM OFFERING
NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING
Titles REPORT FROM JAPAN
Types Interview-Comment
Timet 15:00
No.: 2 programs to finiah
Origins John Lerch
Audience: General
Serial Numbers 56-53
Release Date: January 6, 1957
With this offering we present the final two programs from the John Lerch series
REPORT FROM JAPAN* especially produced in Japan for the NAEB Radio Network.
These programs are devoted to news and views about Japan.
Program Issue
Topic
11. 1 Music
12. 2 Buddhism
